scripts.build: rm -rf dist && eleventy --input=src --output=dist && postcss src/styles/tailwind.css -o dist/assets/styles.css && node scripts/cleanup-orphan-js.js
scripts.build:prod: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production eleventy --input=src --output=dist && postcss src/styles/tailwind.css -o dist/assets/styles.css && node scripts/minify-html.js && node scripts/cleanup-orphan-js.js
